display_long_description:
🏆 Epic Workouts
🎯 BoxFit, Battle Ropes, Pyramid, and much more
💪🏼 All Levels, Beginner to Expert
🚀 Train with Sam & El, our virtual trainers 
🏰 Work Out in Engaging Landscapes
▶️ Compatible with Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro Headsets
🆓 Free Demo Version, only available on AppLab! 

Strengthen different muscle groups with epic workouts for all fitness levels. Work your upper body with punches, hooks, twists, battle ropes, and dumbbells. Target your lower body with squats, lunges, slams, and footwork. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced enthusiast seeking a challenge, EIR Training Lite keeps you motivated and engaged. 

Train with our virtual warriors Sam and Elouise, as they bring energy, expertise, and a touch of fun to your workouts. Get ready to move and sweat with your personal fitness duo. 

Immerse yourself in a world where fitness meets fantasy. Our environments make your workouts engaging, transport you to realms that inspire, and turn exercise into an adventure.

EIR Training Lite is an exclusive free demo version of EIR Training, developed by Valkyrie Industries in collaboration with fitness advisors and personal trainers. Available on Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, and Meta Quest Pro.
